message: I'm excited to offer you this product! It's a great deal at $100, and I'm confident you'll love it. Plus, I've had great feedback from other customers who've purchased this exact product. What do you say? Will you take it home today?
Thank you for your confidence in the product, Alice. I appreciate the discount and the positive feedback from other customers. I look forward to giving this product a try!

It's a great opportunity to get another product at an unbeatable value. Plus, I've got a feeling you'll really like the new design. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the special edition and the value, given my experience with the last product, I think it's best for me to pass on this opportunity.
